unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing the ROI?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing the R O I?**

unnormalised: Ever felt like shouting "Satyam Shivam Sundaram!" into the void, hoping your social media efforts are actually working? You're not alone! Many desi businesses in Mumbai & beyond are now seriously digging into follower analytics.
normalised: Ever felt like shouting "Satyam Shivam Sundaram!" into the void, hoping your social media efforts are actually working? You're not alone! Many desi businesses in Mumbai and beyond are now seriously digging into follower analytics.

unnormalised: Gone are the days of just counting likes, folks. We're talking deep dives: who’s REALLY engaging with your content, from where, and when? Are those 'followers' actually buying your handcrafted jhumkas or booking that Ayurveda retreat near Rishikesh you're promoting?
normalised: Gone are the days of just counting likes, folks. We're talking deep dives: who’s REALLY engaging with your content, from where, and when? Are those 'followers' actually buying your handcrafted jhumkas or booking that Ayurveda retreat near Rishikesh you're promoting?

unnormalised: Experts at IIT Delhi held a webinar on 25/10/2024 at 14:00 hrs specifically on this! They emphasized that understanding age demographics & engagement patterns helps tailor content & target ads effectively. Imagine knowing that your "chai time" stories resonate best with the Delhi crowd between 17:00 hrs and 18:00 hrs – powerful stuff!
normalised: Experts at I I T Delhi held a webinar on twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty four at two P M specifically on this! They emphasized that understanding age demographics and engagement patterns helps tailor content and target ads effectively. Imagine knowing that your "chai time" stories resonate best with the Delhi crowd between five P M and six P M – powerful stuff!

unnormalised: Some influencer marketing platforms even claim to now be able to track the real-world impact of a campaign down to the number of Rs. spent at a particular retailer after seeing an ad. Talk about granular! Before you launch your next Diwali campaign on 01/11/2024, make sure you've got your analytics in place. It's no longer a luxury, it's a necessity to stay ahead in this digital Bharat!
normalised: Some influencer marketing platforms even claim to now be able to track the real-world impact of a campaign down to the number of rupees spent at a particular retailer after seeing an ad. Talk about granular! Before you launch your next Diwali campaign on first november two thousand and twenty four, make sure you've got your analytics in place. It's no longer a luxury, it's a necessity to stay ahead in this digital Bharat!
